status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi Team,

We are upgrading our Mac book OS to Mac Version 10.14.6 (18G103), we will use Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.10.0.201709271713. 

Can you please let us know if after upgrading the Studio we could use the same Android SDK or we will have to donwload new SDK?
fields.summary: Android SDK support on iOS 13 SDK

comments.body:
[~ios.admin@investis.com], Appcelerator Studio was released in October 2017. As this is now out of support and is well outside of our support cycle lifetime I cannot do anything but recommend you upgrade to Studio 6.0.0 available to download [here|https://platform.axway.com/#/product/studio].

It's not clear to me what you mean by {{use the same Android SDK }}, could you please clarify? If you mean whether you can use the already installed Android SDK, then yes I would assume so.

Lastly, please use this jira for bug issues only. It is not a support line
